mapper.select: SELECT r.*, concat(e.first_name, ' ', e.last_name) as name FROM reply r join employees e on r.emp_no = e.emp_no where b_no = #{b_no} and r_no > 0 order by r_no asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.amount};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (b_no, emp_no, reply) VALUES (#{b_no}, #{emp_no}, #{reply})
